title: aylabadia05
author: aylabadia05
content: On a podcast, I heard that Bitcoin Core 23.0 is in the process of updating to version 24.0. There are some changes that will be in the new version. The focal point I heard was regarding block downloads.Â Van Wirdum and Provoost discussed the possibility of abolishing the checkpoint. In my opinion, for those who are still in the technical learning stage, the latest upgrade is better around the old wallet migration tool to a descriptor wallet.Maybe this information is too late for me to share, or it has been previously published by other users.News aired on Oct 8, 2022.Source:1. Podcasts on YouTube2. Bitcoin Magazine
